name: Toprak Hipostazı
desc:
Code name: Gimel. A high-purity Geo entity.
Elemental hypostases are ultra-compact structures with a high mass.
Concentrated elemental energy forms a solid shell around the core of the hypostasis, leaving only the core reactive to elemental stimuli.

dropMaterial.name: Bazalt Sütun
dropMaterial.desc:
A pillar formed by the shell of a Geo Hypostasis, composed of high-density Geo energy.
It is a testament to Geo's status as the heaviest of the elements. Maybe the reason a Geo Hypostasis creates this pillar out of its shell and raises itself is just to get closer to the sky, not to combat enemies.

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topazı Kırıntısı
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topazı Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topazı Külçesi
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

value.text: Elemental creatures who protect themselves from incoming attack with their durable shell. Find an opportune moment to land a blow to their <color=#ffe14b>elemental core</color> . They are able to create <color=#ffe14b>Geo constructs</color> in fights and restore their health when they feel threatened. You must be able to efficiently destroy these constructs if you want to defeat these creatures.
